meanings.sent1: The cowpunchers rounded up the cattle for branding.
meanings.sent2: The ranch hired cowpunchers to help with the cattle drive.
meanings.sent3: The cowpunchers joked about having to 'fight' the cows to get them in the pen.
meanings.sent4: The cowpunchers' determination to handle the livestock was as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cowpunchers wrestling with the stubborn cows stayed in my mind.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of cowpunchers riding into town on horseback.
meanings.sent2: The cowpunchers were known for their skill in handling cattle.
meanings.sent3: The cowpunchers' hats made them look like a team of adventurers.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the cowpunchers was as solid as a rock.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the cowpunchers working together left a lasting impression on me.
